name: Imhotep, Pyramid Builder
description: Do you like watching others do all the work?Cats do!In this unique game (AVX req'd) you plan, direct and oversee the construction of a Pyramid in Ancient Egypt.Organize agriculture, plan the village, direct the building and watch thousands of workers on screen, in real time.Build it, stone by stone!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7, 64 Bit only! Processor: Intel Sandy Bridge or newer, AMD Bulldozer or newer (2011+) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete GPU with OpenGL 3.2 support. Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7, 64 Bit Processor: Intel Haswell Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX750Ti or faster Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
